div.p: Will write you a few lines this morning as I am dodging the boss and not at work, we have two drivers on a truck now and if we can keep out of sight of the boss one of us will drive in the morning and the other in the afternoon
But if the top kicker comes around and finds one of the fellows around the barracks he get a balling out.
But they dont mind that any more
The boys are tired of this work and want to get out home and they wont take any intrest in there work
We are haveing some real spring weather here now The only thing that is bad is the rain.
It is raining hard now Jno Cartemell is telling some one in the barracks now would be a nice day for ducks.
Lim hasnt been around any more.
I thought maybe he would come over yesterday as was sunday
But I guess he was working I believe we will leave this place (Souilly) some time this month. I dont know when will go but I hope will be
I thank we'll get home some time between May 15 and July 4 Although I am just guessing at that.
They never let a fellow know much while he is in the Army. When we get ready to go they will say pack up we are going to move and wont say where we are going So we have to guess every thing
Now please dont stop writing me because I thank we are coming home. I could be wrong, you know.
And is a long time until May or July, you know
Will how is every thing in Jaxon?
Has the flu killed every body every time I hear from any one they tell me of deaths.
Well I dont know any more to write this time so will quit
